Package com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham

Class EnchantedMazeFactory

java.lang.Object
com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham.MazeFactory
com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham.EnchantedMazeFactory
public class EnchantedMazeFactory extends MazeFactory
Concrete factory: An enchanted maze factory that creates magical components for the maze, such as EnchantedRooms and DoorsNeedingSpells. This factory extends the Abstract Factory class MazeFactory and create enchanted versions of maze components.
